recipeIngredientRows.purchaseProductName: PASTRAMI, BEEF WHOLE MUSCLE SLICED .67 OZ COOKED REF
CHEESE, SWISS SLICED .75 OZ 3.5  TWIN PACK REF
PICKLE, DILL KOSHER CHIP 3/16" PLASTIC REF

recipeMethods.stepInstructions:
1. Whisk together Creole mustard and mayo in a mixing bowl until 
combined.

2. Place in squeeze bottles for service. Hold at 41°F or below.

3. Using an ounce scale, portion pastrami into 3.5 oz portions.

4. Roll pastrami into portion paper. Store below 40°F until ready for service.

Hot Sandwich:

1. Ensure impinger oven is turned on to 500°F and belt speed is set to 1
minute, 20 seconds.

2. Squeeze 1 tbsp Creole mayo, evenly, onto 1 rye bread slice.

3. Place pre-portioned pastrami on top of mayo on bread.

4. Place 2 Swiss cheese slices on top of pastrami.

5. Place bottom half of prepared sandwich and 1 other rye bread slice 
on a screen. Run through the impinger to toast, 1 minute 20 seconds.

6. Remove screen from impinger.

7. Place 2 pickle slices on top of melted Swiss cheese.

8. Squeeze 1 tbsp Creole mayo evenly on the other rye bread slice. 
Place on top of other half of prepared sandwich to close.

9. Wrap sandwich in paper or place in to-go container. Serve.


Cold Sandwich:

1. Ensure impinger oven is turned on to 500°F and belt speed is set to 1
minute 20 seconds.

2. Place 2 plain rye bread slices on a screen and run through the 
impinger to toast.

3. Remove bread from impinger.

4. Squeeze 1 tbsp Creole mayo evenly onto each toasted bread slice.

5. Place pre-portioned pastrami on top of one of the slices of toasted 
bread.

6. Place 2 Swiss cheese slices on top of pastrami.

7. Place 2 pickle slices on top of Swiss cheese.

8. Place the other slice of toasted bread on top of prepared sandwich, 
to close.

9. Wrap sandwich in paper or place in to-go container. Serve.
